kickstart.post: # # Add user groups for software w/limited usage # declare -A sw_gids=( ["seagate"]=8473 ) for PACKAGE in "${!sw_gids[@]}"; do grep -q "^${PACKAGE}-users:" /etc/group if test $? -ne 0; then groupadd -g "${sw_gids[$PACKAGE]}" $PACKAGE-users fi chgrp -R $PACKAGE-users /opt/$PACKAGE chmod -R g+rX /opt/$PACKAGE chmod -R g-w /opt/$PACKAGE chmod -R o-rwx /opt/$PACKAGE done
